kbentries.name: DBT Incident Service Level Priorities (SLA)
kbentries.description:
DBT Incident SLA Level - Response Targets:




The following rules will apply the SLA level when the Impact and Urgency Values are set for a ticket:

Priority Ticket Rule
Impact Value
Urgency Value
SLA Ticket Priority
Priority 1- High Impact , High Urgency
Organisation Wide
High
Urgent
Priority 2 - High Impact, Medium Urgency
Organisation wide
Medium
High
Priority 2 - Medium Impact, High Urgency
Multiple Users Affected
High
High
Priority 3 - High Impact, Low Urgency
Organisation wide
Low
Normal
Priority 3 - Low Impact, High Urgency
Single User Affected
High
Normal
Priority 3 - Medium Impact, Medium Urgency
Multiple Users Affected
Medium
Normal
Priority 4 - Low Impact, Low Urgency
Single User Affected
Low
Low
Priority 4 - Low Impact, Medium Urgency
Single User Affected
Medium
Low
Priority 4 - Medium Impact, Low Urgency
Multiple Users Affected
Low
Low
